It is sad to announce that, but PlaShiki is reaching its end of life. Some functionality (particularly, manual video addition and reports) were disabled, and on August 15th, 2021 the server will be shut down forever.

Why?
To be honest, there are quite a few reasons. First of all, I developed this project primarily for myself, but recently found out that I don't actually use it at all.
Secondly, this field is oversaturated as is, and fully automated systems turned up not to be competitive.
And lastly, I'm just tired (including hate from some individuals in the community).

What about money?
I conceived PlaShiki as an open and non-commercial project, and I want it to say like this till the end.
Money that is left in project's budget will go towards our moderators as a payment for their labor (I will also add my own money, to not feel guilty about them).
In case they refuse, the money will go to charity.

What now?
On August 15th, 2021 the server will be shut down forever. Then, until the domain expires (May 3rd, 2022), the website will contain a dummy page, and API will return error EOL_REACHED.
Since user lists are synchronized with Shikimori, nothing will happen to them.
Around August 20th, I will dump the database and publish it as public domain.
Project source code will still be available on GitHub.

As I have already stated, field is oversaturated, and there are many alternatives:
wakanim.tv, crunchyroll.com, netflix.com ‚Äì legal streamings.
nekomori.ch ‚Äì very similar project, founded around the same time as PlaShiki, and is still developed and maintained.
Anime365 ‚Äì paid non-legal streaming, which is pretty good, no matter what.
AniLabX ‚Äì despite the disagreements with the developer, not a bad app, which now (seems to?) also have a PC version.
animego.org, jut.su, yummyanime.club and others ‚Äì Russian-language free non-legal streamings.
twist.moe, 9anime.to, and many others ‚Äì English-language free non-legal streamings.
rutracker.org, nyaa.si, subsplease.org ‚Äì torrents, need no introduction.

Thanks for your support during these 2 years! ‚ù§Ô∏è
Despite everything, this was a good experience, and I'm very grateful for that.
